title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1270.6 - Use of public aircraft facilities conditioned upon payment of prescribed fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1270.6 - Use of public aircraft facilities conditioned upon payment of prescribed fees

State Regulations

No person shall land or take off an aircraft on or from a
public landing area, or use a public landing area, public ramp and apron area, public passenger ramp and apron area, public cargo ramp and apron area, or a
public aircraft parking and storage area, except upon the payment of such fees
and charges as may from time to time be prescribed, unless such person is
entitled to use such area under a lease or other agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1270.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
